summary: Symbol of Love - Chapter 3 - Indrel - 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia [Archive of Our Own]
title: Symbol of Love - Chapter 3 - Indrel - 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Chapter three of Symbol of Love is out now!

Chapter summary: Aftermath of the fire. Inko enters mamabear mode.

Fic summary: Izuku was proclaimed practically quirkless at the age of four. The error is discovered four years later when his mother gets caught in a fire. Terrified at losing his mother Izuku’s quirk activates and he saves her life, but not without a cost.His quirk allows him to protect the people he loves and with it he manages to get All Might’s attention. When they get caught in a villain attack he proves his heroism and at the age of eight All Might becomes his mentor - and father figure.The threat of villains is always hanging over his head and the lives of his loved ones are constantly in danger. But with his own quirk and with One for All Izuku will fight to become stronger and overcome everything in his path to become the greatest hero.This is the story of how Izuku became the Symbol of Love.

title: My Prompts Ideas
description:
by Akasha_Gamer

*WARNING THIS IS MY PROMPTS IDEAS SORRY IF NOT WHAT YOU WANT*

As I have already said this is my prompts ideas I’m sorry if you got excited over nothing. anyway this is where I’ll post prompts ideas please feel free to look inside and if anyone will be wanting to make a prompts from me please message and credit me is all I ask for. Any way I’ll probably be updating once a week but life gets in the way sometimes plus I have school so I won’t always update on time. I know probably no one will do any of these or look at them that’s fine I just want to put out something I’m proud of plus good training for writing anyway that’s all I have to say so good morning afternoon or night goodbye.

Words: 483, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Katekyou Hitman Reborn!, Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling, 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia, Kuroshitsuji | Black Butler, Naruto, ナンバカ | Nanbaka, Gravity Falls, One Piece, Shingeki no Kyojin | Attack on Titan, Fullmetal Alchemist - All Media Types, Fairy Tail, Death Note (Anime & Manga), Creepypasta - Fandom, Marvel Cinematic Universe, Spider-Man - All Media Types, Tokyo Ghoul, Sword Art Online (Anime & Manga)

  • Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence, Major Character Death

trail.content:
by Akasha_Gamer

*WARNING THIS IS MY PROMPTS IDEAS SORRY IF NOT WHAT YOU WANT*

As I have already said this is my prompts ideas I’m sorry if you got excited over nothing. anyway this is where I’ll post prompts ideas please feel free to look inside and if anyone will be wanting to make a prompts from me please message and credit me is all I ask for. Any way I’ll probably be updating once a week but life gets in the way sometimes plus I have school so I won’t always update on time. I know probably no one will do any of these or look at them that’s fine I just want to put out something I’m proud of plus good training for writing anyway that’s all I have to say so good morning afternoon or night goodbye.

Katsuki Bakugou / Izuku Midoriya fanfics on Ao3
Blog created April 2, 2019. No fics before this date will be archived.
This page is still under construction

title: Another Shot
description:
by Kitastrophe

The previously-unconscious boy stares up at him with wide, wet eyes, pushing up the lampshade in order to view Katsuki better. Katsuki waits for him to speak, possibly introduce himself, but he doesn’t. He remains quiet, wordless, breathing heavily.

Katsuki breaks the silence. “What the hell? Is there something you wanna say to me?”

Wherein the last thing Katsuki would expect is to take care of a drunk stranger, but things have a strange way of working out.

Words: 4149, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia
  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Bakugou Katsuki, Midoriya Izuku, Ashido Mina, Kaminari Denki, Kirishima Eijirou
  • Relationships: Bakugou Katsuki/Midoriya Izuku
  • Additional Tags: Alternate Universe - College/University, Alternate Universe - No Quirks (My Hero Academia), Excessive Drinking, Ambiguous/Open Ending, drunk Izuku, good ol’ responsible Katsuki, Sexual Humor

summary:
Izuku: *walks through walmart, putting miscellaneous objects into his cart with no thought or fear of god*
Shinsou: What is all...
body:
Izuku: *walks through walmart, putting miscellaneous objects into his cart with no thought or fear of god*
Shinsou: What is all of this?
Izuku: Shin told me that instead of sitting on my ass and being sad I should "Go get it!"
Shinsou: Get what?
Izuku: Unclear, which is why I'm going to get everything just in case *points to cart*

Me:
